summary: An ancient Giant's Tomb. Conquer the Giant Anak and his three demonic sons with the help of the Biblical Caleb the Son of Jephunneh and the Full Armor of God.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/29524-1-1368166905.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][b]Version 1.7[/b][/center]

[center]by Shemoel / stormshallow / SCWatchman
email: watchid910@gmail.com[/center]

[center][youtube]r6KhS-ae4qM[/youtube][/center]
[b][heading]RATED: M[/heading][/b]
For MATURE audiences ONLY, due to a combination of Dark Environments, Tension Building Music, Gory Images, and Blood Thirsty Giants. LOL

If you are playing Elder Scrolls, I would assume that you know this already and can handle the content of this quest.


[b][heading]Requirements:[/heading][/b]
Requires official [b]Skyrim.esm[/b] and always be sure to have the newest [b]Update.esm[/b] This Mod should stand on its own without

Dawnguard, Hearthfire, and Dragonborn.

[color=red]Crimson Tide - Blood[/color] by Magus is recommended
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12798//] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12798// [/url]


[b][heading]Description:[/heading][/b]
This mod is not lor friendly, but rather is in the spirit of my Pilgrim's Progress Mod for Oblivion. Many of the features that I built into that mod, I also incorporated into this mod. If you liked that mod, you should like this one a lot more. Theives, Murderers, Necromancers, Warlocks, Vampires, Werewolves, Cannibals, and the worshipers of the Daedra, are all welcome, (of course), but probably will not wish to stay due to the [b]"overwhelming Christian content"[/b] (as one person said about my Oblivion mod).

This mod is made of a conglomeration of biblical time periods events and biblical allegories.

Israel came into Egypt in Jacob's 130th year, (Genesis 47:19), and then dwelt in Egypt 400 years, (Genesis 15:13), then wandered in the wilderness 40 years after rejecting the witness of Joshua and Caleb, (Caleb being 40 years old at the time and not aging from that time until he was 85), after a 5 year conquest of Canaan, Caleb began to drive out the Anakim from Hebron. So [b]THE TOMBS OF ANAK[/b] quest is set between [b]1247[/b] BC & [b]1451[/b] BC depending on whether the Biblical Creation took place in 3800 BC or 4004 BC.

[b]The mod also includes:[/b]

a small library of over 100 non-copyrighted Christian related books, including the whole [b]King James Bible[/b].

The Evergreen Lodge

Clothes, (Mostly for Human Male only).

A built in [b]Modesty Feature[/b] (Included .esp that leaves this out if clipping issues occure)

A Playable Warrior [b]Angel Race[/b]

[color=red]Flying Mod Beta[/color] by PorroOne is recommended if you want to try to fly
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15775//?] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15775//? [/url]

[b]Damascus Forge, Armor & Swords[/b]
These are set at around 90 AD, and are meant to represent the physical aspects of a specially crafted Damascus version of the Roman style armor described by Paul in Ephesians 6 and can be improved with silver if one has advanced Smithing skills.

[b]The Full Armor of God[/b]
This is a more powerful Medieval style version of the Ephesians 6 Armor and is meant to represent the supernatural aspects of being IN Jesus.

[b]Goliath's Sword[/b] carried by David, (1 Samuel 21:8-9).

[b]Blessing Table[/b]

[b]Dwemer Music Box[/b]

Dwemer [b]Dragonlock[/b] Handgun

Dunmer [b]Silverlock[/b] BlackPowder Handgun

AND MUCH MUCH MORE


[b][heading]Followers:[/heading][/b]
[b]Caleb[/b] the son of Jephunneh
[b]Penuel the Persistent[/b] and his faithful dog [b]Flavious[/b]
[b]Berthold Bacon[/b]


[b][heading]Installation:[/heading][/b]
Put the following files from the “skyrim\Data” folder in this zip folder into your "Steam\SteamApps\common\skyrim\Data" folder.
[b]TTOA.bsa[/b] & [b]TTOA.esp[/b] & [b]Scripts[/b]
Activate under Data Files in your Launcher.


[b][heading]Tools Used:[/heading][/b]
Skyrim Creation Kit - [url=http://www.creationkit.com/] http://www.creationkit.com/ [/url]
Photoshop CS3 - [url=http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/] http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/ [/url]
Fallout Mod Manager - [url=http://www.sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=247976] http://www.sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=247976 [/url]
TES5Edit - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859/] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859/ [/url]
Blender - [url=http://www.blender.org/] http://www.blender.org/ [/url]
Wings3D - [url=http://www.wings3d.com/] http://www.wings3d.com/ [/url]
NIFSkope - [url=http://www.niftools.org/] http://www.niftools.org/ [/url]
Audacity – [url=http://www.audacity.sourceforge.net/] http://www.audacity.sourceforge.net/ [/url]
MAGIX Music Maker for MySpace - [url=http://www.magix.com/] http://www.magix.com/ [/url]
